snippet.title: Mercurius FM - Columns (Vaporwave Clotho Cover) [Visual]
snippet.description:
COLUMNS is a vaporwave VR art experience based on Mercurius FM's remix of the song CLOTHO from the classic SEGA puzzle game, COLUMNS. This video contains clips and footage from the free VR experience which is playable on Windows PCs with and without VR. The vaportrap style remix is also available on all digital music stores and streaming services including Apple Music, Spotify, Bandcamp, and more. 

Apple Music/itunes... 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/columns-single/1375396273

Spotify...
https://open.spotify.com/album/0eYjF0agp6mpHNc6K3Yd3u?si=a7lfmpK4SsWHoaGdNu7eMQ

Bandcamp...
https://mercuriusfm.bandcamp.com/album/columns

Amazon...
https://www.amazon.com/Columns-Mercurius-FM/dp/B07CKSWBLF/

Download and Play the Free PC VR Experience...
https://virtuaworlds.itch.io/columns

Learn More:
Mercurius FM... http://mercuriusfm.com
Virtua Worlds... http://virtuaworlds.io

Release Date: May 03, 2018
Record Label: Broken Synth Recordings, LLC
http://brokensynth.com


Tags: sega columns vaporwave vaportrap aesthetic genesis mega drive art vr virtual reality
